name: Jurassic Craft Dino Hunter - Tuvok Multiplayer With Mine Mini Skins for MC Pocket Remastered Edition
name_original: Jurassic Craft Dino Hunter - Tuvok Multiplayer With Mine Mini Skins for MC Pocket Remastered Edition
description:
Famous ORIGINAL MC JURASSIC CRAFT DINO HUNTER - The most intense pvp experience is now available to download on App store

►► Recommended by SkyDoesMinecraft and TheDiamondMinecraft ►►

MC JURASSIC CRAFT in WORLDWIDE MULTIPLAYER MODE! Each room can has up to 15 players! You can play it with other players all over the world.


*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry,
• While there is no online opponent we make sure not to get bored and use it in your weapon
• Up to 15 players in one game.
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!
• Create & Joins Rooms: Play with other players all around the world
• Dynamic switch team in game

*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***

• Put yourself before you try to test a large Multiplayer war
• Wide choice of arms,
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects! Use headphones for maximum fun!


*** CHALLENGE ***

Challenge your limits!Your record will upload to Game Center.To be the 1st-killer all around the world. We believe you can do it! Just Fighting!!!
